remarks.format:
## Remarks This enumeration is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A> methods in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> classes, as well as by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SearchForVirtualItemEventArgs> class. Identifying the nearest item in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control can vary depending on the operating system the application is running on; therefore, the search direction is a hint, and not an absolute guarantee of results.
